text: Malek Jaziri was the defending champion, but he did not compete that year. Marcos Baghdatis won the title, beating Michał Przysiężny in the final, 6–1, 4–6, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Geneva Open Challenger - Singles 2014 Singles
title: 2014 Geneva Open Challenger – Singles
